content: *here is another quick-and-easy afghan perfect for the beginning crocheter the long fringe makes a bold statement lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 1317 skill level beginner level 1 jiffy® article #450 3 colors 14 balls total mc 450-099 fisherman 7 balls a 450-181 country green 3 balls b 450-325 el paso 4 balls multi/print crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm 11 inches piece of cardboard for fringe pattern 16-row repeat work in double and treble_crochet stitch u s
